attributes.action: Save from closure the post office at Stannington Village in Northumberland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The post office in Stannington is a vital part of the community of Stannington Parish. There has been a post office in Stannington for over 100 years and it's closure would mean the demise of the last remaining village shop and resource leaving the village without a heart.
